title: Design the drone hardware
description: Create a detailed design for the autonomous drone that will be used in this project.

title: Define the software architecture for drone control and data processing
description: Develop a high-level design for the software that will manage the drone's autonomous navigation, climate data collection, and data processing.

title: Develop the climate data processing algorithms
description: Create algorithms to process and analyze the collected climate data, optimizing humidity and temperature for agricultural purposes.
dependencies: Define the software architecture for drone control and data processing

title: Implement the drone's autonomous navigation system
description: Develop the software that allows the drone to navigate autonomously within the agricultural environment.
dependencies: Define the software architecture for drone control and data processing

title: Create a user-friendly interface for the drone system
description: Develop an intuitive interface that allows farmers to easily operate, monitor, and manage their autonomous climate-controlling drones.
dependencies: Implement the drone's autonomous navigation system

title: Develop a database structure for storing climate and drone data
description: Design and implement a robust database to store the collected climate data, drone status information, and other relevant data.
dependencies: Define the software architecture for drone control and data processing

title: Setup continuous integration and deployment pipeline
description: Create a CI/CD pipeline to ensure smooth, automatic code deployments and testing.
dependencies: Implement the drone's autonomous navigation system
Create a user-friendly interface for the drone system

title: Perform initial testing on drones and software
description: Conduct thorough tests to ensure that the drones, their software, and the overall system function as intended.
dependencies: Implement the drone's autonomous navigation system
Create a user-friendly interface for the drone system
